name: quiz-game-app
description: Interactive quiz game with QR registration and graph-based questions

scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: echo 'Please run backend and frontend in separate terminals' && echo 'Terminal 1: npm run backend' && echo 'Terminal 2: npm run frontend'
scripts.build:all: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
